[100,99,98,97])"},"recreateBlockheaders(uint256,bytes[])":{"notice":"starts with a given blocknumber and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocksonly usable when the given blocknumber is already in the smart contractit will be checked whether the provided chain is correct by using the reCalculateBlockheaders functionif successfull the last blockhash of the header will be added to the smart contract"},"saveBlockNumber(uint256)":{"notice":"stores a certain blockhash to the state"},"searchForAvailableBlock(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"searches for an already existing handle"}},"removeNodeFromRegistry(address)":{"details":"only callable by the unregisterKey-accountonly callable in the 1st year after deployment","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of the locked","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of a former in3-node"}},"revealConvict(address,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"reverts if a block with that number cannot be found in either the latest 256 blocks or the blockhash registryreverts when tryin to convict someone with a correct blockhashreverts when trying to reveal immediately after calling convictreverts when the _signer did not sign the blockreverts when the wrong convict hash (see convict-function) is used","params":{"_blockNumber":"number of the wrongly provided blockhash","_blockhash":"the wrongly provided blockhash","_r":"r of the signature","_s":"s of the signature","_signer":"the address that signed the wrong blockhash","_v":"v of the signature"}},"totalNodes()":{"return":"the number of total in3-nodes"},"transferOwnership(address,address)":{"details":"reverts when trying to change ownership of an inactive nodereverts when trying to pass ownership to 0x0reverts when the sender is not the current ownerreverts when inacitivity is claimed","params":{"_newOwner":"the new owner","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier"}},"unregisteringNode(address)":{"details":"reverts when the provided address is not an in3-signerreverts when the node is already unregisteringreverts when not called by the owner of the node","params":{"_signer":"the signer of the in3-node"}},"updateNode(address,string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"details":"reverts when the sender is not the owner of the nodereverts when the signer does not own a nodereverts when trying to increase the timeout above 10 yearsreverts when trying to change the url to an already existing one","params":{"_props":"the new properties, will be changed if different from the current onec","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier","_timeout":"the new timeout of the node, cannot be decreased. Has to be at least 1h","_url":"the url, will be changed if different from the current one","_weight":"the amount of requests per second the node is able to handle"}}},"title":"Registry for address"},"removeNodeFromRegistry(address)":{"notice":"removes an in3-server from the registry"},"returnDeposit(address)":{"notice":"returns the deposit after a node has been removed due to
